co.cask.cdap.api.service.http
Interface HttpServiceContext

All Superinterfaces:
DataSetContext
public interface HttpServiceContext
extends DataSetContext

The context for a HttpServiceHandler. Currently contains methods to receive the HttpServiceSpecification and the runtime arguments passed by the user.
